snippet: The Electronic Privacy Information Center, based in Washington, asked the Department of Justice to investigate Google on Tuesday, after more news emerged surrounding Google's collection of personal information from wireless home networks in 2010.
abstract: The Electronic Privacy Information Center, based in Washington, asked the Department of Justice to investigate Google on Tuesday, after more news emerged surrounding Google's collection of personal information from wireless home networks in 2010.

headline.main: Congressman and Privacy Group Call for Google Inquiry
